turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I would like to order a Caffè Americano

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and where will you be picking this up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks, 1748 Pacific Ave, Tacoma, WA 98402

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tall

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add anything to it

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, and 3 packets of sugar and milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there a specific type of milk you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, almond milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what time will you pick it up

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 7AM

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay is there anything else

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, add a Black and White Mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there any additional things?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, the Black and White Mocha just as it is

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I've completed your order for a tall Caffè Americano with 3 sugars and almond milk and a Venti Black and White Mocha to be picked up at 7AM at the starbucks on Pacific Ave, Tacoma WA

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: have a nice day
